synonyms.synonym: Ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex 14 kDa protein

protein.specific_function: This is a component of the ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex (complex III or cytochrome b-c1 complex), which is part of the mitochondrial respiratory chain. This component is involved in redox-linked proton pumping

go_class.description: monovalent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity
generation of precursor metabolites and energy
mitochondrial electron transport, ubiquinol to cytochrome c

reference.reference_text: Suzuki H, Hosokawa Y, Toda H, Nishikimi M, Ozawa T: Cloning and sequencing of a cDNA for human mitochondrial ubiquinone-binding protein of complex III. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1988 Oct 31;156(2):987-94.
